data.name: MoonEdge
data.description:
What is MoonEdge (MOONED)?
MoonEdge is the first decentralized launch pad fully dedicated to project launches on Polygon. At MoonEdge, we aim to become the benchmark for Layer 2 Initial Dex Offering (IDO) platforms. Our mission is to offer easier token distribution, facilitate fundraising for new innovative projects, and guarantee project legitimacy.

What makes MoonEdge stand out from the crowd?
Our priority is our community and the builders. 

For our community, MoonEdge introduces the fairest tiered system designed to have a low entry barrier, so no investor is left out. With guaranteed allocations, no one needs to be lucky or competes with bots to win the right to participate in any IDO.

The fair-tiered system will be in constant evolution, with new fair mechanisms being implemented, fine tuning based post-IDO data analysis and a community tier soon to be released!

To ensure that our community gets the best opportunities possible, we only host top-quality projects that went through our thorough vetting process. The selection criteria cover the project's innovative approach, the whitepaper, the technical development, the team behind the project, business plan, Tokenomics, roadmap and more.

For the builders, MoonEdge facilitates decentralized fundraising and allows for a fair tokens distribution to a wide and supportive community. In addition, the MoonEdge platform allows a wide range of IDO customization options through an easy to use interface, an example of which is the vesting integration.

Furthermore, MoonEdge and their partners offer a full set of expertise to the projects being hosted on the platform. Their teams can benefit from technical, marketing, advisory and legal support.

Finally, through our vast partner network, MoonEdge offers its help in creating multiple beneficial long-term partnerships between projects and the expertise they long for.
